songs.title: It’s All Good
songs.lyrics:
Yeah
It’s all good though
Check it

It was all good
Rolling through the city
Take you to my hood
Yeah
Can’t believe this time
You were misunderstood
Sitting in my mind
And saying it’s all good
It was all right
Didn’t think that I was going to
Make you my wife

Till I caught you sneaking
All through the night
Well this is how it’s got to be
Reminding me you were never
Really finding me

Look I didn’t think
You were a slut
When I first met you
You seemed like
The perfect woman
For me  to step to
But I was already tipsy
When I walked in the party
Saw you on the dance floor
And watched you
Get a little naughty

So I eased up
Blunt in my mouth
Lit the trees up
Pocked full of velveeta
Got the cheese up
You got it in
And I didn’t want to stop you
While them other cats
Jocked you
I stood there
And watched you
You looked
You winked
And came my way
My game my point
So I made my play
You said you liked
My style and the way that I pivot
Then you cracked a smile
And I knew you was with it
So you hopped in the whip
I took you back to the pad
Stripped you down butt naked
Started waxing that ass


Didn’t realize
But it happened so fast
One night ain’t expect it
To last

It was all good
Rolling through the city
Take you to my hood
Yeah
Can’t believe this time
You were misunderstood
Sitting in my mind
And saying it’s all good
It was all right
Didn’t think that I was going to
Make you my wife

Till I caught you sneaking
All through the night
Well this is how it’s got to be
Reminding me you were never
Really finding me

Yeah
Money shot leche
Body real sexy
So you wouldn’t feel bad
I called you the next day
Never got an answer
Knew she was a dancer
So I stopped over
By her job
Just to chance her
She wasn’t there
Then I start peeping

This bitch is no good
She in the hood
Still creeping
Didn’t want to see me
What really is the reason
I know I put it down
Last night is fairly recent
30 plus pump bitch
I’m a grown man

I got my own thing
You got your own thing
Didn’t think she was
So callous and so cold
Man
I know the looks
But then the poacher
With the home game
But who really knows
Every day life man
It’s really how it goes
Yeah
To waste a good thing
It’s a shame
It really blows
And all these silly hoes
I really pity those

It was all good
Rolling through the city
Take you to my hood
Yeah
Can’t believe this time
You were misunderstood
Sitting in my mind
And saying it’s all good
It was all right
Didn’t think that I was going to
Make you my wife

Till I caught you sneaking
All through the night
Well this is how it’s got to be
Reminding me you were never
Really finding me

It was all good
A month ago
But lately it seems like
You been fronting though
Gonna have you
Showing the  side
That I don’t want to show
So miss me
With the bullshit
I don’t want to know

You could have
Stayed there
When I needed you too
You thought you only needed me
I needed you too
I know you miss me
Still want to be with me
Think about me every time
You drink and get tipsy
But it’s all good
Cause we all back
See everything we had
Girl it’s all past
I tell my homies about you
And they all laugh
They say I never
Should have fucked
With your dog ass

I used to take you
Through the hood
She used to roll with me
But now I think
We’re both right
Where we’re supposed to be
And if you see me out
Please don’t be
Approaching me
You know you’ll never meet
A dude that’s as cold as me
ICE
WORD

It was all good
Rolling through the city
Take you to my hood
Yeah
Can’t believe this time
You were misunderstood
Sitting in my mind
And saying it’s all good
It was all right
Didn’t think that I was going to
Make you my wife

Till I caught you sneaking
All through the night
Well this is how it’s got to be
Reminding me you were never
Really finding me
